document.heading: Performance Rating Levels Amendment Act of 2000

history.narrative: Law 13-131, the “Performance Rating Levels Amendment Act of 2000,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 13-438, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 1, 2000, and March 7, 2000, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 22, 2000, it was assigned Act No. 13-301 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 13-131 became effective on June 24, 2000.
